
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18985033" title="发布于 2025-07-15 08:16">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Visual Studio 现已支持新的、更简洁的解决方案文件（slnx）格式</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081415246-1254925369.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>解决方案文件是 Visual Studio 中用于组织和管理多个项目的文件，其后缀通常为<code><span>.sln</span></code><span>（基于 UTF-8格式的）。它充当一个容器，维护着项目之间的引用关系、构建配置以及其他设置，定义了解决方案的结构以及包含哪些项目。现如今 Visual Studio 解决方案文件已经支持新的、更简洁的基于 XML 格式的解决方案文件格式<code><span>.slnx</span></code><span>。</span></span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.sln文件格式内容</span></h2>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081440923-1364177720.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code><span><br><span>Microsoft Visual Studio Solution File, Format Version 12.00<span><br># Visual Studio Version 17<span><br><span>VisualStudioVersion = 17.13.35931.197<span><br><span>MinimumVisualStudioVersion = 10.0.40219.1<span><br><span>Project("{FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC}"<span>) =&nbsp;"Entity"<span>,&nbsp;"Entity\Entity.csproj"<span>,&nbsp;"{329B4D23-FBA9-41FE-8735-0230C3B7E2F3}"<span><br><span>EndProject<span><br><span>Project("{FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC}"<span>) =&nbsp;"ConsoleApp"<span>,&nbsp;"ConsoleApp\ConsoleApp.csproj"<span>,&nbsp;"{B953C125-9072-49FD-BB08-0065C55F2C81}"<span><br><span>EndProject<span><br><span>Project("{FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC}"<span>) =&nbsp;"Service"<span>,&nbsp;"Service\Service.csproj"<span>,&nbsp;"{D89B7585-1EF1-40D0-975D-F1F5B3EF38EF}"<span><br><span>EndProject<span><br><span>Project("{FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC}"<span>) =&nbsp;"Utility"<span>,&nbsp;"Utility\Utility.csproj"<span>,&nbsp;"{3BDB8ABE-89E6-41C2-814E-F3E62A2CD2BB}"<span><br><span>EndProject<span><br><span>Project("{FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC}"<span>) =&nbsp;"WebAPI"<span>,&nbsp;"WebAPI\WebAPI.csproj"<span>,&nbsp;"{CBCE9228-F543-473F-8440-D1BE80888E78}"<span><br><span>EndProject<span><br><span>Project("{FAE04EC0-301F-11D3-BF4B-00C04F79EFBC}"<span>) =&nbsp;"DatabaseFirst"<span>,&nbsp;"DatabaseFirst\DatabaseFirst.csproj"<span>,&nbsp;"{4E7286C0-3357-450B-9A8F-EABB0AFDEEA1}"<span><br><span>EndProject<span><br><span>Global<span><br><span>&nbsp;GlobalSection(SolutionConfigurationPlatforms) = preSolution<span><br><span>&nbsp; Debug|Any CPU = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; Release|Any CPU = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp;EndGlobalSection<span><br><span>&nbsp;GlobalSection(ProjectConfigurationPlatforms) = postSolution<span><br><span>&nbsp; {329B4D23-FBA9-41FE-8735-0230C3B7E2F3}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {329B4D23-FBA9-41FE-8735-0230C3B7E2F3}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {329B4D23-FBA9-41FE-8735-0230C3B7E2F3}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {329B4D23-FBA9-41FE-8735-0230C3B7E2F3}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {B953C125-9072-49FD-BB08-0065C55F2C81}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {B953C125-9072-49FD-BB08-0065C55F2C81}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {B953C125-9072-49FD-BB08-0065C55F2C81}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {B953C125-9072-49FD-BB08-0065C55F2C81}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {D89B7585-1EF1-40D0-975D-F1F5B3EF38EF}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {D89B7585-1EF1-40D0-975D-F1F5B3EF38EF}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {D89B7585-1EF1-40D0-975D-F1F5B3EF38EF}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {D89B7585-1EF1-40D0-975D-F1F5B3EF38EF}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {3BDB8ABE-89E6-41C2-814E-F3E62A2CD2BB}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {3BDB8ABE-89E6-41C2-814E-F3E62A2CD2BB}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {3BDB8ABE-89E6-41C2-814E-F3E62A2CD2BB}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {3BDB8ABE-89E6-41C2-814E-F3E62A2CD2BB}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {CBCE9228-F543-473F-8440-D1BE80888E78}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {CBCE9228-F543-473F-8440-D1BE80888E78}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {CBCE9228-F543-473F-8440-D1BE80888E78}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {CBCE9228-F543-473F-8440-D1BE80888E78}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {4E7286C0-3357-450B-9A8F-EABB0AFDEEA1}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {4E7286C0-3357-450B-9A8F-EABB0AFDEEA1}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {4E7286C0-3357-450B-9A8F-EABB0AFDEEA1}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp; {4E7286C0-3357-450B-9A8F-EABB0AFDEEA1}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU<span><br><span>&nbsp;EndGlobalSection<span><br><span>&nbsp;GlobalSection(SolutionProperties) = preSolution<span><br><span>&nbsp; HideSolutionNode = FALSE<span><br><span>&nbsp;EndGlobalSection<span><br><span>&nbsp;GlobalSection(ExtensibilityGlobals) = postSolution<span><br><span>&nbsp; SolutionGuid = {135D33CF-9839-44D7-BF75-06D9D61A302A}<span><br><span>&nbsp;EndGlobalSection<span><br><span>EndGlobal<span><span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.sln文件格式现存问题</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>手动编辑容易出错，由于其工具为中心的格式，小错误可能导致配置错误，影响工作流程。</span></li>
<li><span>在多人团队协作环境中，合并冲突频发（深有感触，同时新增或者删除了某个文件、项目等），可能导致工作丢失、文件损坏和延迟。</span></li>
<li><span>文件内容冗长且包含大量重复信息（如 GUIDs 和元数据），导致文件体积庞大，使你的工作变得杂乱。</span></li>
<li><span>.SLN 文件格式是 Visual Studio 特有的，并非广泛认可的标准，这限制了其与外部工具和自动化程序的兼容性。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>将.sln文件格式转换为新的.slnx文件格式</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>接下来我们分享2种将现有项目的.sln文件格式转换为新的.slnx文件格式的方法。</span></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>使用 Visual Studio 将.sln格式另存为新的.slnx格式</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081508859-1979989131.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081513916-1654759132.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET CLI 命令转换迁移</span></h3>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>现在 .NET CLI 已更新以处理 .slnx 文件格式，使用&nbsp;<code><span>dotnet sln migrate</span></code><span>&nbsp;命令将传统的 .sln 解决方案文件迁移到新的 .slnx 解决方案文件格式。</span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081526610-985927709.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.slnx文件格式内容</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31TL97BEwXWKYjwfZEI9jNJp4Oib0z2fLxdrjbiccVISibiaFpR4JLzzrPldAr19ysb4I0VQaA2VhAFWS/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&lt;Solution&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &lt;Project Path="ConsoleApp/ConsoleApp.csproj"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &lt;Project Path="DatabaseFirst/DatabaseFirst.csproj"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &lt;Project Path="Entity/Entity.csproj"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &lt;Project Path="Service/Service.csproj"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &lt;Project Path="Utility/Utility.csproj"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<span><br><span>&nbsp; &lt;Project Path="WebAPI/WebAPI.csproj"<span>&nbsp;/&gt;<span><br><span>&lt;/Solution&gt;<span><span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.slnx文件格式的优势</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>减少了合并冲突的可能性，使团队协作更加顺畅。</span></li>
<li><span>保留了空白和注释，有助于保持文件的组织性和可读性。</span></li>
<li><span>采用标准化的 XML 格式，具有广泛的理解和使用基础，便于与其他工具集成。</span></li>
<li><span>新的解决方案文件格式在设计时考虑了清晰性，使开发人员能够轻松阅读和修改项目配置。这消除了手动编辑复杂文件时产生的许多困惑和错误。</span></li>
<li><span>新格式采用合理的默认设置，保持解决方案文件简洁并优化性能。这有助于高效利用资源，即使对于大型解决方案也是如此。</span></li>
<li><span>与旧版 Visual Studio 兼容，同时与 MSBuild 约定对齐，便于与其他工具平台集成。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>vs-solutionpersistence</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>用于 Visual Studio 解决方案文件的共享序列化器和模型，处理传统的 .sln 文件和新的 .slnx 文件。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/microsoft/vs-solutionpersistence" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/microsoft/vs-solutionpersistence</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081544970-1330239311.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多 Visual Studio 实用技巧</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250715081558543-65803307.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
</div>
